meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Donald J. Trump embraced old enemies at City Hall and announced that he would reduce his project on the Upper West Side. Page B1. Dark Days for Libraries
Budget cuts are hitting New York libraries hard. Check-out lines are longer, hours shorter and book purchases shrinking. Page B1. Gain for Illegal Aliens
A Federal judge ruled that undocumented aliens can charge employers with racial or sex bias under the 1964 Civil Rights Act. Page A22. How to Build an Engineer
An assistance program at 89 American colleges has fostered a surge in engineering enrollment among minority students. Education, page B8.
